subdisciplines.name: Anthropology of Religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between religion and culture in human societies.

subdisciplines.name: Philosophy of Religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of the nature of religion, including its epistemological, metaphysical, and ethical implications.

subdisciplines.name: History of Religions
subdisciplines.description: The study of the historical development of different religious traditions and the ways they have shaped human cultures.

subdisciplines.name: Psychology of Religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of the psychological aspects of religious beliefs, practices, and experiences.
